alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cherry County through 715 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Cody to 14 miles west of Nenzel to 9 miles northwest of Medicine Lake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cody, Kilgore, Nenzel, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Cody Lake and Eli. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 141 and 178. Highway 61 between mile markers 216 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
